injury_desc: The Arizona Diamondbacks transferred LHP A.J. Puk from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list with a left elbow inflammation.
The Arizona Diamondbacks placed LHP Blake Walston on the 60-day injured list as he recovers from Tommy John surgery. He's expected to miss the 2025 season.
The Arizona Diamondbacks transferred RHP Christian Montes De Oca from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list with a right elbow inflammation.
The Arizona Diamondbacks transferred RHP Corbin Burnes to the 60-day injured list with right elbow inflammation.
The Arizona Diamondbacks transferred RHP Cristian Mena from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list with a right shoulder strain.
The Arizona Diamondbacks placed RHP Justin Martinez on the 60-day injured list with a right UCL sprain.
The Arizona Diamondbacks transferred RHP Kevin Ginkel to the 60-day injured list with a sprained right shoulder.
The Arizona Diamondbacks placed INF Pavin Smith on the 60-day injured list due to a left quad strain.
The Arizona Diamondbacks placed LHP Tommy Henry on the 60-day injured list due to left ulnar collateral ligament surgery.

The Atlanta Braves transferred RHP AJ Smith-Shawver on the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list due to a strained right elbow.
Smith-Shawver underwent Tommy John surgery and will miss the remainder of the 2025 season.
The Atlanta Braves transferred LHP Aaron Bummer to the 60-day injured list due to a left shoulder inflammation.
The Atlanta Braves transferred INF Austin Riley from the 10-day injured list to the 60-day injured list with a strained lower abdominal muscle.

The Atlanta Braves transferred RHP Spencer Schwellenbach from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list with a fractured right elbow.
The Baltimore Orioles transferred RHP Brandon Young to the 60-day injured list from the 15-day injured list with a strained left hamstring.
The Baltimore Orioles transferred RHP Félix Bautista to the 60-day injured list due to right shoulder surgery.
The Baltimore Orioles said on Friday (Aug. 1) that RHP Grayson Rodriguez will not need reconstruction on his elbow injury.
The Boston Red Sox transferred RHP Hunter Dobbins from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list with a right ACL tear.
The Boston Red Sox placed RHP Josh Winckowski on the 60-day injured list as he recovers from elbow inflammation in mid-May.

The Boston Red Sox placed RHP Kutter Crawford on the 60-day injured list as he recovers from right patellar tendinopathy. Crawford will undergo what will likely be season-ending surgery on his right wrist as reported on (Jun. 25) Wednesday.
The Boston Red Sox transferred RHP Liam Hendriks to the 60-day injured list with right hip inflammation.
The Boston Red Sox transferred RHP Luis Guerrero to the 60-day injured list due to a right elbow strain.
The Boston Red Sox transferred INF Marcelo Mayer from the 10-day injured list to the 60-day injured list due to a sprained right wrist.
The Boston Red Sox placed LHP Patrick Sandoval on the 60-day injured list as he recovers from his Tommy John surgery.
The Boston Red Sox reported on Saturday (Aug. 2) that RHP Tanner Houck will undergo Tommy John surgery due to a right flexor pronator strain.

The Boston Red Sox transferred INF Triston Casas to the 60-day injured list due to a left patellar tendon rupture. Casas will be off crutches in two weeks and expects to be ready for Opening Day next season, Jen McCaffrey of The Athletic reports.
The Boston Red Sox placed INF Vaughn Grissom on the 60-day injured list with plantar fasciitis.

The Chicago Cubs transferred LHP Justin Steele from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list and will undergo season-ending surgery to repair his flexor tendon and address UCL damage in his left elbow.
